com.github.wuic.nut
Class NutsHeap

java.lang.Object
  com.github.wuic.nut.NutsHeap
All Implemented Interfaces:
HeapListener, NutDaoListener
public class NutsHeap
extends Object
implements NutDaoListener, HeapListener

This class represents a set of nuts. Each Nut is built thanks to an associated NutDao which only needs a particular path to create it.

A path is an abstract location of one to many nuts because it could be a regular expression. It is relative to the base path of the NutDao.

All the paths must refer to the same type fo path (CSS, JS, etc).

Since:
0.1.0
Version:
1.7
Author:
Guillaume DROUET

NutsHeap

public NutsHeap(NutsHeap other)

Builds a heap by copy.

Parameters:
other - the heap to copy

NutsHeap

public NutsHeap(List<String> pathsList,
                NutDao theNutDao,
                String heapId,
                NutsHeap... heaps)
         throws StreamException

Builds a new NutsHeap. All the paths must be named with an extension that matches the NutType. If it is not the case, then an BadArgumentException will be thrown.

Some additional heaps could be specified to make a composition.

Parameters:
pathsList - the paths
theNutDao - the NutDao
heapId - the heap ID
heaps - some other heaps that compose this heap
Throws:
StreamException - if the HEAP could not be created

getNutDao

public NutDao getNutDao()

Gets the NutDao of this NutsHeap. Caution, don't use its method like NutDao.create(String, com.github.wuic.nut.NutDao.PathFormat), NutDao.proxyUriFor(Nut) or NutDao.withRootPath(String) but to the corresponding proxy methods in this class which check if the NutDao to actually use is not in one of the heaps that compose this NutsHeap.

Returns:
the NutDao

the proxy URI

polling

public boolean polling(Set<String> paths)

When a DAO performs a polling operation, this method is called first with all path which are going to be polled.

The paths are computed thanks to their representation (regex or not) specified when this listener has been registered to the observable.

If the listener returns false, the observable will stop notifying it only during the polling operation.

Specified by:
polling in interface NutDaoListener
Parameters:
paths - all the real paths which are going to be polled
Returns:
false if polling should not be done, true otherwise

hasCreated

public Boolean hasCreated(Nut nut)

Indicates if this NutsHeap has created thanks to its own DAO a Nut. The methods search for the original nut if the specified nut is a generated one.

Parameters:
nut - the nut
Returns:
true if heap has created a Nut with this path, false otherwise

containsHeap

public boolean containsHeap(NutsHeap heap)

Indicates if the given heap equals to this heap or any heap of its composition. The equality if evaluated recusrively through the composition.

Parameters:
heap - the heap to compare
Returns:
true if its equals to this heap or to a heap of its composition

nutPolled

public boolean nutPolled(NutDao dao,
                         String path,
                         Long timestamp)

Called when a nut has been polled.

When the observable object checks in one operation the changes on a set of nuts, the listener could notifies the observable to stop notifying it only during the operation.

Specified by:
nutPolled in interface NutDaoListener
Parameters:
dao - the DAO which polls
path - the polled path
timestamp - the timestamp retrieved when poling the nut
Returns:
true if this listener needs to be notified of any other update during the observable's operation, false otherwise

getComposition

public final NutsHeap[] getComposition()

Returns the heaps that compose this instance.

Returns:
this composition

notifyListeners

public boolean notifyListeners(NutsHeap observable)

Notifies the listeners that this heap has detected an update in one or many nuts.

Parameters:
observable - the heap where change has been detected
Returns:
false for convenient usage in caller
